widget.label: Resend a Verification Email
widget.tooltip: If you registered on our website and you did not receive a confirmation email, then you can use this form to request for a new email.
widget.help: After registration, we require each user to verify their email address. If you properly entered your email address, then you will get a code that can be used to verify that you indeed own (or act as the owner of) that email address. However, if the email never makes it, you won't be able to verify your new account. This feature allows you to request a new email with the verification code so you can still complete your registration.

widget.label: Email
widget.tooltip: Enter the exact same email address as you used for registering on our website. We will then send you another confirmation email.
widget.help: Enter your email address as you used to register on our website.

widget.label: Resend
widget.tooltip: Once you entered your email address click here to have our system send you a new email.
widget.help: Please enter your email address in the box so named and then click on the Resend button.

widget.label: Verify Code
widget.tooltip: Click here to go to the verification form
widget.help: Just received the email after all? Click on this link to go back to the verification form or click the verification link included in the email.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the home page.
